Video


                    <ui-video title="Introduction to User Research in BUILD"
                    src="https://www.youtube.com/v/Q6N2cqf6V90">
                    </ui-video>

ui-video Options

titleWithin
Name type description
title string Title for the video.
description string description for the video.
src string Link to the video.
tileWidth string Width for the video tile Example: "100px". Default: 270px
tileHeight string Height for the video tile Example: "50px. Default: 150px
titleWithin boolean Show title within video tile. Default: false
